ideas.title: Automation Exposure and Older Worker Labor Force Exit
ideas.rationale: Strong policy relevance, feasible with ACS data, novel focus on older workers and extensive margin. DR identification appropriate for observational study.

ideas.title: Disability Insurance Applications and Automation Exposure
ideas.rationale: Interesting mechanism but feasibility limited by data access requirements.

ideas.title: Early Retirement and Automation by Industry
ideas.rationale: Better identification but limited by industry-level data and manufacturing focus.
